channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Air travel has become a regular mode of transportation for millions of people. But flying can be difficult and dangerous if the pilot cannot control the plane’s movement in the sky. The forces of air turbulence create significant discomfort for passengers, as well as damage to aircraft components. To minimize the effects of turbulence, airlines employ a variety of tactics and tools to help pilots safely navigate their flights. A plane’s movement is dictated by the rotation of its propellers and engine thrust.
